price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߍ߲߬ߍ߲߫، ߊ߲ ߝߣߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߝߊ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߕߊ߲߬ ߠߋ߬
arabic: قَالُواْ بَلۡ وَجَدۡنَآ ءَابَآءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفۡعَلُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: qālū bal wajadnā ābāanā kadhālika yafʿalūna
